overview: Will (Everyone Must Die) is bound for vengeance against The Killers for what they did to him. He now knows their leader is the first Slasher: Norm! But he's also forced to deal with the new era of Slashers at the same time: Spookface, Fisherman, and Brenda. It's time to put together a team of the world's greatest Survivors to wipe out this threat. Will they be able to stop Slashers AND Killers?
title: The Survivors
